}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Dual WLAN (AC+N), 867MBit/s (5GHz) + 400MBit/s (2.4GHz)'', :''4x Gigabit LAN, 1x USB 3.0, VDSL/ADSL, Media Server''
